column4: How do I install DHCP on Ubuntu... it failed on the OS installation, and I have no idea where to start on linux... On the help pages there are dozens of pages that link to other links..... .:|
you want a dhcp server or just need to connect to a dhcp server?
then click your device and Configure it and just look for the dhcp option
you might need to disable/enable it
ok, run "sudo ifdown eth0" then "sudo dhclient eth0"
run desg and see if you can find something about eth0
whats before that? anything about networking card?
